headline: Looking At The Narrative For BNP Paribas (ENXTPA:BNP) After Analyst Upgrades And Higher Targets
summary: What Changed in the BNP Paribas Price Target Model The updated fair value for BNP Paribas now sits at about €98.87, up from about €93.87, with only small tweaks to the revenue growth input at about 7.21% and profit margin assumption at about 25.18%, while the discount rate is unchanged at 12.3%. Those shifts mirror how several banks have recently revisited their views on the bank's execution and earnings power, nudging their own targets higher while keeping core risk assumptions steady.
